name: Miracle
effect: Play another event, it gets +○.

name: Forgive
effect: Add ○ +1 counters on a people.

name: Blessing
effect: Add ○ +1 counters on a wonder.

name: Spring
effect: Add ○ +1 counters on a people.

name: Earthquake
effect: Destroy all peoples with power ○ or less.

name: Flood
effect: Put ○ -1 counters on all people.

name: Prophecy
effect: You may play up to ○ extra cards this turn.

name: Flashback
effect: Return ○ event cards from your discard pile to your hand.

name: Darkness
effect: The opponent discards ○ cards from their hand.

name: Unmaking
effect: Destroy a wonder with power ○ or less.

name: Revolt
effect: Destroy a people with power ○ or less.

name: Regrowth
effect: Restore a people with power ○ or less.

name: Eruption
effect: Shuffle up to ○ blue wonders into their owners' decks.

name: Time Warp
effect: Return up to ○ wonders from play to their owners' hands.

name: Aurora
effect: Draw ○ cards.

name: Meteorite
effect: Destroy all opponent peoples with power ○ or less.

name: Fire
effect: Your red events get +○.

name: Wisdom
effect: When you pass, you may play a card with power ○ or less.

name: Rivers
effect: You can score tied peoples with power ○ or less.

name: Forests
effect: When you pass, you may restore a people with power ○ or less.

name: Deserts
effect: You can score destroyed peoples with power ○ or less.

name: Sky
effect: Your other blue wonders get +○.

name: Sun
effect: Your green wonders get +○.

name: Light
effect: When you end the game, you may play a card with power ○ or less.

name: War
effect: When you pass, you may destroy a people with power ○ or less.

name: Love
effect: Your peoples are worth ○ points extra.

name: Knowledge
effect: Opponent events get -○, down to a minimum of 1 power.

name: Mountains
effect: Your peoples with power ○ or less are indestructible.

name: Animals
effect: This is worth ○ points at the end of the game.

name: Seas
effect: Your alive peoples with power ○ or less are worth +1 points.

name: Moon
effect: Whenever you have less than ○ cards in hand, draw back to ○.

name: Stars
effect: When you draw cards, you may do from the shared deck. They have power ○.

name: Greeks
effect: You have twice or more cards in hand than the opponent.

name: Egyptians
effect: You have the most total power among green wonders.

name: Romans
effect: You have the most total power among red wonders.

name: Judeans
effect: You have the most total power among blue wonders.

name: Vikings
effect: You have the most cards in your deck.

name: Babylonians
effect: You have the most total power among wonders.

name: Minoans
effect: You have the most wonders.
